name: Parsnip
description:
A humble root vegetable, 
mild in flavor.

name: Cauliflower
description:
A large, white floweret 
that sells for a good 
price.

name: Potato
description:
A starchy tuber, 
versatile for cooking.

name: Wheat
description:
A common grain, 
essential for baking and 
animal feed.

name: Blueberry
description:
Small, sweet berries 
that are a summer 
delight.

name: Tomato
description:
A juicy, red fruit often 
used as a vegetable in 
cooking.

name: Hot Pepper
description:
A fiery pepper that adds 
a kick to any dish.

name: Melon
description:
A large, sweet fruit, 
perfect for a hot summer 
day. Sells for a high 
price.

name: Cranberry
description:
Tart, red berries that 
are popular in the fall.

name: Pumpkin
description:
A festive gourd, great 
for decoration or 
delicious pies.

name: Grape
description:
Sweet, juicy berries 
that grow in bunches. 
Can be used for wine or 
eaten fresh.
